casebody.data:
No. 10-6867. Ronald Haddad, Jr., Petitioner v. River Forest Police Department, et al. 562 U.S. 1112, 131 S. Ct. 825, 2010 U.S. LEXIS 9672,

178 L. Ed. 2d 563,

December 13, 2010.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Seventh Circuit denied.

Same case below, 384 Fed. Appx. 513.
